per_frame_1=bassfix=.01+.01*bass;
per_frame_2=midfix=.01+.01*mid;
per_frame_3=trebfix=.01+.01*treb;
per_frame_4=bassif=if(above(bass_att,.0),bassif+bassfix,if(above(bassif,.95),bassif*.86,bassif*.96));
per_frame_5=midif=if(above(mid_att,.0),midif+midfix,if(above(midif,.95),midif*.855,midif*.96));
per_frame_6=trebif=if(above(treb_att,.0),trebif+trebfix,if(above(trebif,.85),trebif*.85,trebif*.96));
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=q21=.5+(.01*sin(time*.41)+.05*sin(time*.62)+.05*sin(time*.44)+.01*sin(.25*midif+time*.35));
per_frame_9=q22=.5+(.01*sin(time*.11)+.05*sin(time*.32)+.05*sin(time*.95)+.01*sin(.25*bassif-time*.51));
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q11=bassif;
per_frame_12=q12=midif;
per_frame_13=q13=trebif;
per_frame_14=q14=sin(bassif/fps*2);
per_frame_15=q15=sin(midif/fps*2);
per_frame_16=q16=sin(trebif/fps*2);
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=//time modifiers, used in the blob movement
per_frame_19=q1=time*1.31;
per_frame_20=q2=time*1.43;
per_frame_21=q3=time*1.68;
per_frame_22=q4=time*1.93;
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=//sin & cos
per_frame_25=q5=sin(time*.426);
per_frame_26=q6=sin(time*.251);
per_frame_27=q7=sin(time*.917);
per_frame_28=q8=sin(time*.537);
per_frame_29=q9=.5*cos(time*.52)-.5*cos(time*.663);
per_frame_30=q10=.5*sin(time*.31)-.5*cos(time*1.04);
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=monitor=bassif;
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=//sx=1+.5*cos(q12*.1+time*.268);
warp_1=`#define sampler_pic sampler_cells
warp_2=`sampler2D sampler_pic;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body
warp_5=`{
warp_6=`uv-=.5;
warp_7=`uv.y*=.5+.15*sin(q11*1.7)*q6;
warp_8=`uv.x*=1+.05*sin(q12*1.1)*q5;
warp_9=`uv+=.5;
warp_10=`ret=tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_11=`
warp_12=`uv.x-=.65;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float3 rret=ret;
warp_15=`rret = tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv*.23);
warp_16=`rret = max(rret, tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv*.165 + 0.03*float2(cos(uv.y*(10+10*sin(q11))-q1),sin(uv.x*10+q2)+2*q11)));
warp_17=`rret /= max(rret, tex2D(sampler_noise_hq, uv*2 + 0.03*float2(cos(uv.y*(20+10*cos(q11))+q3),sin(uv.x*27-q4)+2*q13)));
warp_18=`float mrret=1.2*rret-(.8*rret.yzx);
warp_19=`
warp_20=`//rret*=float3(.9+.5*q14,.9+.5*q15,.9+.5*q16);
warp_21=`
warp_22=`ret=min(max(rret.x,mrret),max(rret.z,mrret));
warp_23=`ret-=lerp(GetBlur3(uv), min(rret.yzx,mrret.xxx),.25);
warp_24=`
warp_25=`ret.g+=.45*q8*lerp(rret.y,mrret,.5);
warp_26=`ret.b+=.45*q7*lerp(rret.z,mrret,.5);
warp_27=`ret.r+=.45*q6*lerp(rret.x,mrret,.5);
warp_28=`
warp_29=`ret*=float3(.9+.05*q14,.9+.05*q15,.9+.05*q16);
warp_30=`
warp_31=`}
warp_32=`
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`ret=GetPixel(frac(uv));
comp_5=`
comp_6=`ret *= ret*1.5;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`}
